com.petarmc.durationparser - package com.petarmc.durationparser
 

D

duration() - Method in record class com.petarmc.durationparser.DurationParser
Returns the value of the duration record component.
DurationParser - Record Class in com.petarmc.durationparser
Utility record that wraps a Duration and provides parsing and formatting helpers for human reeadable duration strings.
DurationParser(Duration) - Constructor for record class com.petarmc.durationparser.DurationParser
Compact canonical constructor used by the record.
